title: sAmrAjya dAyakEsha
sahitya:
sAmrAjya dAyakEsha shrI EkAmrEsha bhava pAsha nAsha  
sakala surArcita caraNa yugaLa dhrta tripura vana bhIkara karaLa vimala


anupallavi

  Amra vrkSa mUlajAta tribhuvana vikhyAta shrI girijA samEta
Ananda naTana vinOdApayata saccidAnanda nityAnanda
			(svara sAhitya)
kAlahara krpAnilaya vidIndra vinuta mrgaNDu pAla bAla nArada
sugAnalOla mAra mAra bhakta bhayahara sunayana surAri haraNa


caraNam    shrI kAncIpurAdIsha jagadIsha vara kavi sadAshiva pOSa
lOkAvana catura panca vadana parandAma kalyANa nAma
shOkApahara candrashEkhara dayAkara nAgahara vEdasAra
sundara hara hara shambhO mahAdEva mrDa shiva bhava dEva dEva
